languages.text: Судя по едкому запаху и масляным пятнам, здесь хранился прометий. Видимо, теперь он в руках еретиков.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Это техническое помещение было под чистую разграблено мятежниками

languages.text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.
languages.original_text: Судя по едкому запаху и масляным пятнам, здесь хранился прометий. Видимо, теперь он в руках еретиков.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the caustic smell and the oily stains, they used to store promethium here. It must have since fallen into the hands of the heretics.
Judging by the caustic smell and the oily stains, they used to store promethium here. It must have since fallen into the hands of the heretics.
Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, they used to store promethium here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.
Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

languages.text: Dem ätzenden Geruch und den Ölflecken nach zu urteilen, wurde hier Promethium gelagert. Es muss in die Hände der Ketzer gefallen sein.
languages.original_text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: Dem ätzenden Geruch und den Ölflecken nach zu urteilen, wurde hier Promethium gelagert. Es muss in die Hände der Ketzer gefallen sein.

languages.text: À en juger par l'odeur caustique et les taches graisseuses, du prométhium était entreposé en ces lieux. Il a dû tomber entre les mains des hérétiques.
languages.original_text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par l'odeur caustique et les taches graisseuses, on stockait du prométhium ici à une époque. Il a dû tomber entre les mains des hérétiques.

languages.text: 从腐蚀性的气味和油渍判断，这个大桶原本是用来储存钷素的。但现在，那些钷素肯定是落入异端分子手中了。
languages.original_text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: 从腐蚀性的气味和油渍判断，这个大桶原本是用来储存钷素的。但现在，那些钷素肯定是落入异端分子的手中了。

languages.text: 苛性臭とオイル汚れから判断するに、ここはプロメチウム保管庫だったようだ。ここも異端者の手に落ちたに違いない。
languages.original_text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: 苛性臭とオイル汚れから判断するに、ここはプロメチウム保管庫だったようだ。ここも異端者の手に落ちたに違いない。

languages.text: A juzgar por el olor corrosivo y las manchas de aceite, esto se usaba para guardar prometio. Es muy probable que ahora esté en manos de los herejes.
languages.original_text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por el olor corrosivo y las manchas de aceite, esto se usaba para guardar prometio. Es muy probable que ahora esté en manos de los herejes.

languages.text: Geniz yakan kokuya ve yağ lekelerine bakılırsa burada önceden prometyum saklanıyormuş. Muhtemelen kâfirlerin eline düşmüş.
languages.original_text: Judging by the caustic smell and oily stains, promethium was previously stored here. It must have fallen into the hands of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: Geniz yakan kokuya ve yağ lekelerine bakılırsa burada önceden prometyum saklanıyormuş. Muhtemelen kâfirlerin eline düşmüş.
